Hello,

In the meantime i have made a view experiences with CLINQ and i find its a really usefull Library.

But i have wondered how a OrderedReadOnlyContinuousCollection is handling a resorting. If the Sort-Property-Key for one item is changing this Collection dont move it to the right Position. Instead it removes the Item from the Collection and is adding it again with 2 Collection-Changed-Events. Because of that my ListBox is always loosing its SelectedIndex even if the sortorder isnt really changing.

Are you planning to fix this strange behaviour in the future?

Hi Lector,

I'll take a look at Ordering changes as soon as I can. 

Thanks,

Andy
